summary: PROBLEMS WITH FRAME ON A 2001 R.V. MANUFACTURED BY NEWMAR CORPORATION.  *MR  THE CONSUMER WAS INFORMED THAT RIGHT SIDE OF THE RV WAS RUNNING RIGHT OF THE CENTER. THE CONSUMER WAS TOLD BY NEWMAR THAT THE RV WAS ON A FORD FRAME AND TO TAKE TO IT TO FORD.  FORD CHECKED THE ALIGNMENT AND FOUND IT WAS 3 1/2 INCHES  OUT OF LINE.  AFTER THE FRAME WAS CUT, THE RIGHT SIDE WAS LONGER THAN THE LEFT SIDE.  THE REAR SPRINGS WERE REPLACED BUT IT WAS STILL OUT OF LINE. THE DEALER TACKED A 3.8 INCH PLATE WITH A WHOLE FOR THE SPRING CENTER BOLT CORRECTED THE TRACKING.  *JB
